means: 增加（照片图象）的对比度

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"加强，增强"之意。
means: enhance ： 侧重指增加价值，魅力或声望等使人或物具有超科寻常的吸引力。
heighten ： 通常指使某物的某种性质变得不同于一般的显著或突出。
intensify ： 指深化或强化某事或某物，尤指其特别之处。
aggravate ： 指加剧令人不快或困难的形势。

sentence.Network_en: This could intensify the risk of a nuclear exchange.
sentence.Network_cn: 这可能会加剧爆发核战争的危险。

sentence.Network_en: The conflict is almost bound to intensify.
We must intensify our educational work among our own troops.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须加强自己部队的教育工作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... intense a 强烈的，热烈的 intensify v 变猛烈；加强 pretend v 假装，借口.
综合英语单词表(第二册下) - 豆丁网 ... inevitably ad. 必然地；无法回避地 intensify v. 增强；加强 intensity n. 强烈.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... inflict 击退 intensify 加强，加剧 interdict 阻断通路.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... cupful 一满杯 intensify 强化，加强 purify 净化.

list.abs: 社会必备词汇和缩写 ... ... 欠发达地区 less developed areas 强化功能 intensify functions 强强联手 i win -win co-operation.
lead foil 铅箔intensifying screen 增光屏, 光增强屏pressure test.压力试验
intensify 强化intensifying screen 增感屏intension 加强；强度；紧张；努力；内涵.
... 深层次矛盾 deep-rooted structural imbalance 深化改革 intensify reform 深入浅出 explain the profound in simple terms.
冠状动脉造影时,投照体位以图像增强器(image intensifier)的位置而定,即从图像增强器位置来观察心脏,而不是根据X线束的方位来定位。 冠状动脉造影的投照体位(.

entry.def: If you intensify something or if it intensifies, it becomes greater in strength, amount, or degree.

example.ex: Britain is intensifying its efforts to secure the release of the hostages...
example.tran: 英国正加紧努力确保人质的获释。

example.ex: The conflict is almost bound to intensify...

means.word_mean: 2. make more intense, stronger, or more marked;

sentences.sentence: "The efforts were intensified", "Her rudeness intensified his dislike for her"
"His dislike for raw fish only deepened in Japan"

means.word_mean: 4. make the chemically affected part of (a negative) denser or more opaque in order produce a stronger contrast between light and dark

auth_sentence.content: Storms are expected to intensify and occur more often.
auth_sentence.res_content: Storms are expected to intensify and occur more often.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Storms are expected to intensify and occur more often.

auth_sentence.content: Chan says this is the time to intensify efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chan says this is the time to intensify efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chan says this is the time to intensify efforts.

auth_sentence.content: We assume the government will intensify their fighting seriously.
auth_sentence.res_content: We assume the government will intensify their fighting seriously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We assume the government will intensify their fighting seriously.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tens伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸出去的→广大的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in加强+tens伸展,趋向+e→拉紧→强烈的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 强烈的, 精深的, 透彻的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intense[adj.强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的]+ive表形容词→adj.强烈的, 精深的, 透彻的
tens伸展,趋向+e→adj.紧张的, 拉紧的 v.[使]紧张,[使]拉紧
tens伸展,趋向+ible能……的→adj.可伸长的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可拉长的, 可伸长的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tens伸展,趋向+ile表形容词→adj.可拉长的, 可伸长的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长;扩大;范围;大小;尺寸;电话分机
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tens伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸出去→扩张

stems_affixes.value_cn: 强烈, 剧烈, 强度;亮度
stems_affixes.word_buile: intense[adj.强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的]+ity表名词→n.强烈, 剧烈, 强度;亮度
pre前+tens伸展,趋向+ion表名词→提前摆出一种姿态→自负
tens伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出的状态→紧张
tens伸展,趋向+ity表名词→n.紧张, 紧张度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 加强; 变强; 加剧
stems_affixes.word_buile: intense[adj.强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的]+ify……化→v.加强; 变强; 加剧
tens伸展,趋向+e→adj.紧张的, 拉紧的 v.[使]紧张,[使]拉紧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使都市化;使人有城市派头

electr电+ify使……化,成为……→v.使充电,使通电 v.电气化
fruit果实+ify使……化,成为……→v.结果实,成功

stems_affixes.value_cn: 加强; 变强; 加剧

ugly丑陋的,难看的+ify使……化,成为……→v.弄成难看,丑化

sentences.en: Blowing on fire intensifies the heat.

jushi.english: Blowing on fire intensifies the heat.
